name: Ø Delay in Order Completion (by scheduled completion time)
query:
SELECT DATE_PART('hour', "Order Scheduled Completion" ) AS "Scheduled Completion Hour", 
AVG ("Order Actual Completion" - "Order Scheduled Completion") AS "Avg delay in order completion"
FROM "defaultview-270"
WHERE ("Order Actual Completion" - "Order Scheduled Completion" > DURATION '0hours' OR "Order Actual Completion" IS NULL)
ORDER BY 1
description: Average difference between actual completion and scheduled completion of order by the hour of the scheduled completion
